link_name: zbxdb - generic database plugin, very similar to zbxora
link_desc:
A simple to use plugin and template that contains lot's of zabbix features. Automatic discovery for databases, instances, tablespaces, filegroups, parameters etc. The default set is aiming for resource management and availability.

Limitiations are only by imagination, not by the module.

Other items are easily added by modifying the template and write a query to upload the key value pair to zabbix. The items should be Trapper items. zabbix-sender is used to upload the data to zabbix.

Currently supported databases are Oracle, postgres and msql. More to follow.
features: Low Level Discovery (LLD)|Zabbix Trapper|Database Monitor|Custom Script
author: Ronald Rood
